rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with Vastu aligned direction, featuring a reception area and small foyer.
Spacious living room integrated with a small library section. Windows placed in the east to catch early morning light, following Vastu principles for relaxation.
A formal dining area adjacent to the kitchen and living room. Openings facilitate natural ventilation.
Functional kitchen with modern amenities. South-eastern direction for water activities, Vastu compliant layout.
Luxurious master bedroom with ensuite bathroom; window placement in the north for calm energy and light.
Secondary bedroom designed to maintain privacy and comfort, following Vastu guidelines for stability.
Additional bedroom accommodating extended family members; includes essential storage solutions.
Fourth bedroom to cater for joint family needs, ensuring ample space and privacy.
Shared bathroom on ground floor with adequate water drainage system as per local norms.
Dedicated servant quarters for in-house staff, designed with a separate entrance to ensure privacy and security.

openings.description: Main door oriented towards the northeast to invite positive energy, ensuring secure access per local building codes.
Large windows on the east wall for ample natural light and ventilation as per Vastu principles.
Double door connecting the dining room to the living area, facilitating ease of movement and a sense of openness.

rooms.description: A dedicated home theater area with soundproofing and ambient lighting, designed to provide entertainment in a comfortable environment.
An expansive library room featuring custom shelving and seating arrangements, ideal for a quiet reading space. Windows placed on the eastern side to catch morning light as per Vastu guidelines.
Additional bedroom designed with ample storage and personal space, adhering to Vastu principles by orienting the bed towards the north.
A study room tailored for work or study purposes, featuring a desk oriented in the east for creativity and productivity according to Vastu advice.
Private bathroom attached to one of the bedrooms on the first floor with modern fixtures, ensuring privacy for family members.

openings.description: A centrally located staircase connecting the two levels, designed with safety and accessibility in mind. Spiral design is avoided to adhere to local building norms.
Small window above door frame for light; ensures privacy while maintaining ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
